name: SE2-16 — MAJOR'S RETURN
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Major headland (return), Mahé. Four lights on the cliff's brow
send you back along the wound.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.clue:
Four lights on the cliff's brow
send you back along the wound.
properties.visual_description: Headland curve; four faint stars; dagger in rope coil; torn map corner.
